description:
Today's Tasks is a day to day task manager with multiple uses and unique features not found on similar apps, such as:
 -An expansive Dashboard Mode
 -Dynamic icon
 -Multiple types of tasks
 -Customizable categories
 -webOS alerts
 -Custom sounds for each alert
 -Custom snooze times
 -Calendar view
 -Notes can be added for each task
 -Holdover unfinished tasks to next day

Whether you need a daily checklist, habit tracker, or overall view of your daily tasks, Today's Tasks can keep track of them all with ease.  

The calendar is completely customizable and all elements can be set to whatever color you prefer.  This calendar will give an overall view of your tasks for the month & allows you to track your progress visually.

Today's Tasks lets you choose three different types of tasks, including a simple "checklist" style, a timed-base task, and a counter-type task, so whether you need to remember to take a vitamin, exercise for 30 minutes, or drink eight glasses of water today, Today's Tasks will keep track of your progress simply and easily.

Another feature is a dynamic icon that changes to show you how many outstanding tasks you have for the day.  This way you will not need to open the application to see if you have any tasks left for the day, and can view this information in the app launcher.

Also featured is a very expansive Dashboard mode making use of webOS's dashboard notification area.  Simple tasks can be checked, timed task can be ran, and count-based tasks can be updated with ease.  Dashboard mode can also be set to run automatically each day to give you an overview of the day when you want to see it.

Updates:
